entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 2.
